keywords: PROGRAM: EARLY CHILDHOOD CARE AND EDUCATION
json.title: HARMONIZED MODULAR CURRICULUM   PROGRAM: EARLY CHILDHOOD CARE AND EDUCATION
json.description: This draft nationally harmonized curriculum of the Early Childhood Care and Education program is almost a finalized version with minor revisionary works expected in the future of course. It serves as an official working document as of the year 2009 E.C. And this case has been agreed by all the participant representatives working to this end.
